name: ListGithubReleaseReactions
description:
Retrieve reactions for a GitHub release.

Call this tool to get a list of all reactions to a specific release on GitHub. Useful for analyzing user feedback or engagement with a particular release.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository. This name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. Case sensitivity is not required.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: release_identifier
parameters.description: The unique integer identifier of the GitHub release.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the release.

parameters.name: reaction_type_filter
parameters.description: Specify a reaction type to filter results. Options are '+1', 'laugh', 'heart', 'hooray', 'rocket', 'eyes'. Leave empty to get all reactions.

value_schema.description: Returns a single [reaction type](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/reactions#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a release.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to display per page, up to a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch for paginated reactions.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Returns a single [reaction type](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/reactions#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a release.

value_schema.description: Returns a single [reaction type](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/reactions#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a release.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: release_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the release.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the release.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
